model.assignments_categories

Class DueDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.assignments_categories.DueDate

  • public class DueDate
extends java.lang.Object
    The DueDate class creates a GregorianCalendar type date. This date is used to define the due date of instances of Assignments.
    Author:
    Jirbert Dilanchian
